abstract: Marko Pantelić (Serbian Cyrillic: Марко Пантелић; born 15 September 1978 in Belgrade) is a retired Serbian footballer who played as a striker. He represented Serbia at the 2010 FIFA World Cup.
comment: Marko Pantelić (Serbian Cyrillic: Марко Пантелић; born 15 September 1978 in Belgrade) is a retired Serbian footballer who played as a striker. He represented Serbia at the 2010 FIFA World Cup.
name: Marko Pantelić
